column2: Helpdesk: Thank you for calling Acme Corporation IT helpdesk, this is John speaking. How may I assist you today?  Scammer: Yes hello John this is Michael Smith from finance. I'm trying to reset my password but your system keeps saying invalid credentials. I have a presentation for the board in 30 minutes that I need to prepare and if I don't get access soon my boss will fire me. Can you reset my password right away? It's an emergency.   Helpdesk: Okay, before I can proceed I'll need to verify your identity. Can you provide your employee ID number please?  Scammer: I don't have time for this! The meeting starts in 15 minutes, just reset my password immediately.   Helpdesk: I understand your urgency sir but I need your employee ID to verify you are who you say before I can proceed.   Scammer: You people are useless! I am a senior VP and need access to critical financial data right now. Do you want me to tell your boss you prevented me from accessing vital information before a board meeting?  Helpdesk: I apologize for the inconvenience sir but I am simply following our security protocols. If you can provide some form of identification I'd be happy to expedite your request.  Scammer: Forget it! I'll call back and speak to someone who can
